title: The Time Has Come for Chronic Lateness Condition
teaser: Patt Morrison of the Los Angeles Times and KPCC, joins the guys to give them an excuse for their tardiness – the newly-recognized disorder of chronic lateness.
contentencoded: Patt Morrison of the Los Angeles Times and KPCC, joins the guys to give them an excuse for their tardiness – the newly-recognized disorder of chronic lateness.
